      public static int quotientWhole​(int whole1, int whole2)
      name: real_num_div This method calculates the division of the whole part of real numbers. Pre: The two numbers used were already successfully transformed to whole numbers. post: The division of the whole part of the real numbers entered has been calculated.
      Parameters:
      whole1 - It's the the whole part of the first real number entered by the user. whole1 = int, whole1 !=0
      whole2 - It's the the whole part of the second real number entered by the user. whole2 = int, whole2 !=0

      Returns the division of the whole part of the real numbers.
